title: Static Sound in Game
body: I just updated to the new client and about every other game the sound gets scratchy and staticy. Any solution to this?

replies.body: Your sound software could be outdated and not rendering game sounds well.  Depending on what brand your PC is using, you should be able to look it up and grab a new version specific to your rig.  We also have a[ sound](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761994-Sound-Issues) guide to assist.  I hope it helps!
